events.message: The insured contacted us to file a claim following a car collision that occurred downtown last night.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the details about a vehicle collision reported by the customer.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle this case to ensure timely communication and proper documentation gathering.
We acknowledged receipt of the claim and reassured the claimant that the process will be handled expediently and fairly.
Request was sent to the customer for submission of the police report, photos of the damage, and the driver’s license copy.
The claimant provided all requested documents including the accident report and vehicle repair estimates on time.
An investigation was initiated to verify the circumstances of the accident and assess liability and damage extent.
The investigation confirmed the details provided by the claimant and validated the extent of vehicle damage reported.
An initial settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the damage evaluation and policy coverage.
The customer responded with dissatisfaction, requesting a review of the settlement amount as they felt it was insufficient.
Due to the feedback, the claim was escalated to senior claims adjusters for further evaluation and resolution.
Following thorough review, the claim was approved with an adjusted compensation amount to meet the customer’s concerns.
The approved payment was successfully disbursed to the claimant’s bank account to cover the vehicle repairs.
The claim file was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and satisfaction of all parties involved.
